Return to Fort Raven

The World of GebKasarty has been turned upside down. Can the Derelicts stand against the nightmares continuously entering their universe through the world portal?

  • Home
  • Sessions

Return to Fort Raven

We have just met FiiOria in Rune Forest. We gathered runes and supplies, and we are headed back to Fort Raven to rescue the family.

Round 1

We move back to Fort Raven, and a horde of zombies ambushes us. Some of them look familiar, including the Zombie Knight. They are clearly the zombies we have already killed, and they’ve brought some friends.

Zombies

Zombie Bites Hákarl.

  • melee: 22
  • piercing: 12 (save: 10)
    • const save: 12 (Hákarl avoids plague)
    • Thick Hide gives half damage

  • bludgeoning: 5 (save: 11)
  • trips and falls prone instead of attacking
